sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Footer: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Company Info */}

Vahan Bazar

Your trusted partner in finding the perfect vehicle. We offer premium two-wheelers with unmatched quality, service, and value.

{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

  • Browse Vehicles
  • Compare Vehicles
  • EMI Calculator
  • Test Drive Booking
  • Vehicle Insurance
{/* Services */}

Our Services

  • Vehicle Financing
  • Extended Warranty
  • Maintenance Services
  • Trade-in Services
  • Roadside Assistance
{/* Contact Info */}

Contact Us

123 Business District
Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001

info@vahanbazar.com

+91 98765 43210

{/* Bottom Section */}
© 2024 Vahan Bazar. All rights reserved.
Privacy Policy Terms of Service Cookie Policy
); }; export default Footer;
